SELECT p.id productId,p.NAME productName,count(*) orderNum,sum(og.number) goodsNum,sum(ob.money_amount) orderAmount, round(sum(ob.money_amount)/count(*),2) orderAverage FROM order_book ob INNER JOIN order_goods og ON ob.order_no = og.order_no AND ob. STATUS IN (3, 4, 5) AND ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
INNER JOIN product p ON og.product_id = p.id AND p.fuping = 1
AND p.id IN ${whereCondition}
GROUP BY p.id,p. NAME ORDER BY orderNum DESC
